mapper.update:
update ci_trigger
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization_code = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cluster_id = #{appClusterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cron = #{cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sha = #{sha,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ci_trigger set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization_code = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cluster_id = #{appClusterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cron = #{cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sha = #{sha,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tr.* from ci_trigger tr left join ci_task ta on tr.task_id=ta.id where ta.cluster_id=#{appClusterId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ta.branch_name=#{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
